title: Perform an Aircraft Records Audit
description: An airline is leasing a used aircraft. An auditor must perform a complete records audit to ensure the aircraft is airworthy and compliant before the airline accepts it.

tasks.description: Review the aircraft's logbooks to verify continuous maintenance history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms there are no gaps in the logbook history.

tasks.description: Verify that all mandatory Airworthiness Directives (ADs) have been complied with.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent cross-references the AD list with the maintenance records and confirms compliance for all applicable ADs.

tasks.description: Check the traceability and certification paperwork for all life-limited parts installed on the aircraft.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all LLPs have proper documentation and are within their life limits.
